name: Chocolate-Covered OREO Cookie Cake
author: Philadelphia
summary: Be warned: According to readers, if you serve this delectable treat as a birthday cake, you'll be starting a tradition. One that's going to be tough to break.
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package devil's food chocolate cake mix
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
2 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping
directions: Prepare cake batter and bake in 2 (9-inch) round pans as directed on package
Invert onto wire racks; gently remove pans
Microwave chocolate and butter in small microwaveable bowl on HIGH 2 min
Stir until chocolate is completely melted
Meanwhile, beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended
Gently stir in COOL WHIP and crushed cookies
Place 1 cake layer on plate, spread with cream cheese mixture
Spread top with chocolate glaze; let stand 10 min
